channel.title: Help on my server
channel.description: Well right now my d bow trains str attack and def. How i change it to range only? I wanna make a duel area sort of so how do i make it that u can attack there but dont lose any thing? Thx.

item.title: Help on my server
item.dc:creator: @xx_Santa_pker_xX xx Santa pker xX
item.description:
@xx_Santa_pker_xX wrote:

Uh…can u atleast send a link of ur tut?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2008, 07:49:57 PM[/size][hr]Ok i made the d bow train range but now the specs wont work. Lol.

item.title: Help on my server
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

LOL! I almost cried when i read this. Maybe try usebow = true; just a hint, and yes I have gotten DarkBow to work on my server. And yes, I made my d bow shoot 2 times. And yes, I did post a tut. And yes, it trains Range.

Read full topic

item.title: Help on my server
item.dc:creator: @xx_Santa_pker_xX xx Santa pker xX
item.description:
@xx_Santa_pker_xX wrote:

kinda sucks that no one gives u a good complier…but i will lol

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic
